interface.name: Manifest
interface.javadoc: URI that identifies the Manifest element (this can be specified as the value of the type parameter of the{@link Reference} class to identify the referent's type).
Returns the Id of this Manifest. the Id of this Manifest (or null if not specified)
Returns an {@link java.util.Collections#unmodifiableList unmodifiable list} of one or more {@link Reference}s that are contained in this Manifest. an unmodifiable list of one or more References
